name: places/ChIJi8WsDNhZwokRJYjJGqugBAE
formattedAddress: 111 W 33rd St 20th Floor, New York, NY 10120, USA
adrFormatAddress: 111 W 33rd St 20th Floor, New York, NY 10120, USA

originalText.text: I love that they say "Bonjour!" to greet you when you enter the store. I also love the informative and friendly sales associate, who are willing and ready to answer all of your questions and give you advice. I'm in love with their Shea Butter cream and their Body Almond Oil. They also are very generous with the samples they give when you checkout. It's a little on the small side, but what they lack in size they sure make up in customer service!

originalText.text: Love love the product. I am so happy I started using L'Occitane products. Love the Almond and the Divine Immortelle collection and all hand creams. My friends will be getting a nice gift from L'Occitane  from me.

originalText.text: Same day delivery from the L'Occitane store from Mall @ Millenia. Liana was the sales person that provided outstanding service!! Please reward her for outstanding customer service!! Professor Judith A. Mosto retired

originalText.text: I really like this store and would like it to be bigger. I always enjoy the samples and talking to the sales reps. The product is superior to a lot of other places. What would make this store exponentially better is a place to really have maybe cosmetic parties.

text.text: I really like this store and would like it to be bigger. I always enjoy the samples and talking to the sales reps. The product is superior to a lot of other places. What would make this store exponentially better is a place to really have maybe cosmetic parties.

originalText.text: The products a good product I use the men's cologne went online to make an order signed up username password show the promotion code I entered it when prompted it registered a 40% discount from $118 to $70.80 had two different products same price both $118 reduced to $70.80 for a total of $141.6 anything over $49 with free shipping when I got to the end totaled everything out it came to over $200 and I'm only at 9.25% tax just didn't add up to me I called customer service they explain the code that I entered was only for 20% discount I said but it calculated a 40% discount they said that was a mistake and it should not have done that and they were not able to honor that discount I asked for customer service to call me they did they also said was not able to honor the 40% the customer service representative stated that I should have been able to add the 20% myself and figure that out I explain that your website added it for me and it came to 40% that's what I figured out and now you don't want to honor it so now it's just a principal thing yes they have a good product and yes there are many other products out there that are comparable if not better for around the same price so now for the $70 they've lost a customer forever and apparently that's the choice they're willing to make being an owner of my own business for 70 bucks I would have taken a different route they they they had a manager somebody with more Authority call me name was TANASIA who called twice while I was in the middle of a meeting within seconds of each other I called back within the hour explained who would called and asked if they could call me back still have not received the phone call back did receive an email but I don't respond to emails I respond to phone calls y'all can make your own decisions but I'm not going to work that hard to give my money to somebody this going to blame me for the problem
